com.bigdata.ha

Interface QuorumRead<S extends HAReadGlue>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    QuorumService<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuorumReadImpl, QuorumServiceBase

    public interface QuorumRead<S extends HAReadGlue>
    A non-remote interface for a member service in a Quorum defining methods to support reading on another member of the quorum.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] readFromQuorum(UUID storeId, long addr)
      Used by any service joined with the quorum to read a record from another service joined with the quorum in order to work around a "bad read" as identified by a checksum error on the local service.

    • Method Detail

      • readFromQuorum

        byte[] readFromQuorum(UUID storeId,
                    long addr)
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             IOException
        Used by any service joined with the quorum to read a record from another service joined with the quorum in order to work around a "bad read" as identified by a checksum error on the local service.

        Note: This is NOT the normal path for reading on a record from a service. This is used to handle bad reads (when a checksum or IO error is reported by the local disk) by reading the record from another member of the quorum.

        Parameters:
        storeId - The UUID of the IRawStore from which the record should be read.
        addr - The address of a record on that store.
        Returns:
        The record.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the quorum is not highly available.
        RuntimeException - if the quorum is highly available but the record could not be read.
        InterruptedException
        IOException
        See Also:
        HAGlue#readFromDisk(UUID, long)
